page.title: 03POPULATION
page.content: The population of the village proper is 308. Many other families are housed in estate and farm houses within our grid. The age range at present is from a few months to 100 years. Our centenarian still lives alone. About 5 twelfths of the population are retired (at least 30 over 80!), 3 twelfths are children and 4 twelfths between 20 and 60. Occupations vary from cleansing employees, nurses, agricultural workers,chemical engineer, office workers,lorry drivers and teachers. On the whole the only unemployed are the people newly left school. The village has a great mix with people,in the majority,being supportive and friendly.
